fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-At night, fire a tear at a player in range, attacking them
-(familiar) Give the lead your lucky foot, increasing their luck by 10% tonight [1 night cooldown]

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-In your familiar form, you have no defense
-As the lead, you may multitask silently moving to another spot on the player list. Additionally, you may only target players below you on the player list
Damage: 1 (basic)
Range: 3
Luck: 5%
